availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah Webb (Marion County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and justice of the peace)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and justice of the peace. Fayette County, Kentucky, native. Married to Nancy O. Gatewood in Green County, Kentucky, on December 7, 1831. Father of William J. Webb, Olonzo H. Webb, Mary A. Webb, Calvin Webb, Susan G. Webb, Frank Webb, John J. Webb, and Edward Webb. Cabinet maker in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Cabinet maker in Marion County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Marion County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 87A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Bradfordsville, p. 695-696.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film #007721470.
KYR-0001-031-0068.
